data.title: Job Opportunities
data.text:
Sr. Software QA Engineer, Bachelor’s degree in Electronics Engineering, Information Technology with 5 years’; Participate in requirement gathering, analysis with the project team & business analyst; Prepare, review, test plan, test strategy documents; Prepare, review test cases & automation test scripts to ensure QA best practices; Work with the development team to reuse automated unit test scripts, test stubs and drivers, and development test objects; Work on web and mobile application automation using tools such as Selenium, Java, C#, Appium, See Test, GIT, SVN, Jenkins, Maven, Gradle & Azure Devops; Work on various IDEs like Eclipse, IntelliJ & Visual Studio; Work on test & defect management tools using QC, ALM, JIRA, Azure Devops. Skills: Selenium, Java, C#, Appium, GIT, SVN, Jenkins, Maven, Gradle, Azure Devops, Eclipse, IntelliJ & Visual Studio. Must be willing to travel and/or relocate to work in unanticipated locations throughout the US. No Telecommuting. Send resume to E-Business International, Inc, 4365 Route 1 South, Ste. 212, Princeton, NJ 08540;

Sr. Programmer Analyst, Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology with 5 years of experience’; Collaborate on application support and issues, gather application business requirements, in areas such as Healthcare Claims, Utilization, and determining member eligibility; Assist with technical queries includes activities such as resolving technical problems in ASP.Net, C# programming, IIS setup, and BizTalk issue resolution. Experience in Healthcare Claims application setup, resolving issues in Microsoft SSIS (SQL Server Integration Services) package building; Involve in application development , coding and code deployment; Work on application code development involving C#, ASP.Net, jQuery, WCF (Windows Communication Foundation), Web API, SQL Server Database, and SSIS (SQL Server Integration Services); Review the code done by the team and code review which typically involves reviewing code in ASP.Net, C#, T-SQL (Transactional SQL), SSIS packages, and the Web API. Skills: ASP.Net, C# programming, ASP.Net, jQuery, WCF, Web API, SQL Server Database, and SSIS. Must be willing to travel and/or relocate to work in unanticipated locations throughout the US. No Telecommuting. Send resume to E-Business International, Inc, 4365 Route 1 South, Ste. 212, Princeton, NJ 08540;

Senior Software Engineer, Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology with 5 years of experience; Experience in using technologies such as ASP. Net, HTML/DHTML, CSS, Java Script, Jquery, VB Script, SOAP, Web Services, Windows Services, AJAX, WCF, WPF, Silverlight, C#.Net, VB. Net, ADO. Net, Entity Framework, Linq, VB, SQL Server, PL/SQL, ANTS Profiler, HTTP Watch, FxCop, Resharper, Stlyecop, SVN, VSS & TFS; Work on Waterfall methodology, Agile & Scrum methodology, Web based application, Windows application, ADO. Net, Stored Procedures, SQL Functions, SQL Views, Triggers, SQL Server Database Management, SSRS (SQL Server Reporting Services), SSIS (SQL Server Integration Services), SQL profiler and Database performance Analysis; Use Creational, Structural, Behavioral ,MVC & MVVM design patterns; Work on technologies such as XML, XSD, XML serialization, WSE Security & Microsoft application blocks for data/exceptions. Skills: ASP. Net, HTML/DHTML ,CSS, Java Script, Jquery,VB Script, SOAP, Web Services, Windows Services, AJAX, WCF, WPF, Silverlight, C#.Net, VB. Net, ADO. Net, Entity Framework, Linq, VB, SQL Server, PL/SQL, ANTS Profiler, HTTP Watch, FxCop, Resharper, Stlyecop, SVN, VSS & TFS. Must be willing to travel and/or relocate to work in unanticipated locations throughout the US. No Telecommuting. Send resume to E-Business International Inc, 4365 Route 1 South, Ste. 212, Princeton, NJ 08540.

Senior Software Developer, Master’s degree inComputer Information Systems, Computer Science with 2 years of experience; Responsible for understanding Software Development Life Cycle process including gathering business functionalities, implementing code, unit testing & participate in code review meetings; Involve in database design, create tables, write queries & stored procedures; Involve in Agile Ceremonies such as Spring Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review & Retrospective monitoring software code quality by running diagnosis, by executing source code, generating coverage report using tools like SonarQube; Use bug/issue tracking, project tracking tools like JIRA & Rally; Coordinate with project manager/Scrum Master for estimations, schedule & monitor tasks; Experience in ASP.Net, C#, MVC, ADO.Net, Web API, REST API,WCF, Angular, Azure, Web Service, MS SQL, MySQL, Sybase, PL/SQL, Entity Framework,Javascript, JQuery, Ajax, HT ML. HTML5, CSS, TypeScript, MS Team Foundation Server,TortoiseSVN, GIT, BitBucket, J enkins, Dynatrace, Kibana, SonarQube, JIRA, Rally, Telerik UI, Infragistics, Postman, SoapUI. Skills: ASP.Net, C#, MVC, ADO.Net, Web API, REST API,WCF, Angular, Azure, Web Service, MS SQL, MySQL, Sybase, PL/SQL, Entity Framework,Javascript, JQuery, Ajax, HT ML. HTML5, CSS, TypeScript, MS Team Foundation Server,TortoiseSVN, GIT, BitBucket, Jenkins, Dynatrace, Kibana, SonarQube, JIRA, Rally, Telerik UI, Infragistics, Postman, SoapUI. Must be willing to travel and/or relocate to work in unanticipated locations throughout the US. No Telecommuting. Send resume to E-Business International, Inc, 4365 Route 1 South, Ste. 212, Princeton, NJ 08540.

Sr. Software Engineer, Bachelor’s degree in Electronics Engineering, Computer Science with 5 years of experience; Work on Test functions include Requirement Analysis, Test Planning, Test Effort Estimation, Test Strategy, Test Design, Test Execution, Defect Management & Reporting Test Metrics; Create & execute SQL queries to validate data; Develop test scripts for Webservices which includes SOAP using SOAP UI; Design and implement performance test for improving test efficiency; Use Defect Logging and tracking using IBM Clear Quest & HP Quality Center; Perform Database testing by deploying tags developed to servers & testing them on GUI & Database using DB Visualizer; Develop automated testing solution using Service Virtualization tool LISA; Work on Requirement Management tool sets as 'Requisite Pro', JIRA/confluence or HP Application Lifecycle Management Quality Center (Requirements Module); Work on Risk Analysis with risk mitigation plan Management, Status reporting and Trouble Reporting ( TR) tracking through Rational Clear Quest(RCQ) & Application Lifecycle Management (HP ALM).Skills: SQL queries, GUI, DB Visualizer, Lisa, JIRA, TR, IBM Clear Quest, RCQ & HP ALM. Must be willing to travel and/or relocate to work in unanticipated locations throughout the US. No Telecommuting. Send resume to E-Business International, Inc, 4365 Route 1 South, Ste. 212, Princeton, NJ 08540.

Senior Software Qa Automation Engineer, Bachelor’s degree in Electronics Engineering, Computer Science with 5 years of experience; Involve in Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)-Requirement analysis (mapping conditions/user stories), Design, Development, Application testing & follow principles of Agile & DevOps methodologies; Test across applications including functional, integration, regression/smoke/sanity, end to end & system testing; Involve in Automation script / framework development & strategy using tools – Micro Focus UFT(VB), Selenium-Eclipse(Java)-TestNG, Test Complete, Egg Plant, API web testing through SOAP UI(JSON/XML), POSTMAN tools & code base maintenance; Experience in VB scripting/development of excel macro utilities & manage through Jira projects; Test application execution, engage in different test environments & use SQL queries to extract data records; Work on Continuous Integration/Continuous deployment CI/CD tools (Atlassian BitBucket) to maintain automation scripts and built (Atlassian) Bamboo plans for automation suites; Use defect/requirement/agile management Tools-Blueprint requirement center, Rally, Micro Focus ALM (Quality Center), Tricentis qTest, Atlassian Jira for project activities and report integration with Power BI/Query Surge tools & contribute on tool selection process; Use Service Now to raise incidents for application/web service outages & create change requests for deploying code changes in different test environments to adhere process workflow; Develop macro enabled VBA workbooks on various customization reports from Micro Focus ALM; Administer tools such as Micro Focus ALM, UFT across projects workflow scripting, configuration & installation, extension of plugin support, virtual desktop management (VDI/RDP machines) on Citrix platform, data backup/clean up and recovery management (Archive/Purge); Work on tools like Rational Integration Tester, Rational functional Tester, Requisite Pro and Load Runner. Skills: SDLC, Micro Focus UFT(VB), Selenium-Eclipse(Java)-TestNG, Test Complete, Egg Plant, API web testing through SOAP UI(JSON/XML), POSTMAN, VB scripting, Jira, CI/CD, Atlassian BitBucket, Blueprint requirement center, Rally, Micro Focus ALM (Quality Center), Tricentis qTest, Atlassian Jira, Power BI/Query Surge, Service Now, workflow scripting, Citrix platform, Rational Integration Tester & Rational functional Tester. Must be willing to travel and/or relocate to work in unanticipated locations throughout the US. No Telecommuting. Send resume to E-Business International, Inc, 4365 Route 1 South, Ste. 212, Princeton, NJ 08540.

Lead Java Solutions Architect, Bachelor’s degree in Computer Information Systems, Computer Engineering with 5 years’ experience; Define processes & create project level architecture using Java/J2EE/SpringBoot application; Translate business requirements to microservice components, design overall architecture, prepare UML documentation using VISIO & confluence; Manage end to end delivery of projects including triage, requirements analysis, planning, design, project management, build, testing, deployment, documentation, support, & solutions for spectrum of Enterprise services; Build high performance, low latency financial applications using JMS (IBM MQ preferred), Restful services with tomcat, PL/SQL (Sybase preferred) in Redhat Linx platform; Perform system integration testing using Junit, Mokito, powermokito, SpringTest framework & maintain SLA for applications; Track production issues via Jira & ensure fixes are deployed to production within SLA; Using CI/CD tools such as GIT, Maven, Jenkins, KSH/BASH Scripts to automate the build and deployment and integrating code quality checkpoint tools like SONAR & VARACODE; Deploy application in GCP using docker; Monitor production applications using Splunk & profiling tool Appdynamics and provide solutions for live production issues. Skills: Java/J2EE/SpringBoot, VISIO, confluence, tomcat, PL/SQL, Redhat Linx, Junit, Mokito, powermokito, SpringTest framework, CI/CD tools, GIT, Maven, Jenkins, KSH/BASH Scripts, SONAR, VARACODE & Appdynamics. Must be willing to travel and/or relocate to work in unanticipated locations throughout the US. No Telecommuting. Send Resume to E-Business International Inc, 4365 Route 1 South, Ste. 212, Princeton, NJ 08540.

Software Engineer, Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology with 2 years of experience; Gather requirements, feasibility studies and analyze requirement to provide solutions; Participate in design, code, & test inspections throughout life cycle to identify issues & ensure methodology compliance; Design infrastructure & automated systems to support distributed architecture; Work with architectural environment to provide software programming solution; Develop solutions to improve performance, scalability, & distributed processing capabilities of system; Translate technical specifications, and/or design models into code for new or enhancement projects; Develop & direct software system testing procedures, programming, and documentation; Develop tools to manage configuration and deployment of infrastructure; Work on Web & Windows based Applications using Waterfall, Agile & Scrum methodologies, UML Diagram, Use Case diagrams, Class diagrams, Sequence diagrams, Visio, Requirement gathering, Project & Team management, Project demo, Application build & deployment into web servers, Enterprise Architect & Rational XDE; Work on Creational, Structural, Behavioral, MVC & MVVM design patterns, Analysis, Design, function specifications, technical design documents, development, Software Architecture components & Libraries. Modify software to correct errors, adapt to hardware, reporting formats, costs & security needs to determine hardware configuration. Skills; Waterfall, Agile, Scrum methodologies, UML Diagram, MVC, MVVM, Enterprise Architect & Rational XDE. Must be willing to travel and/or relocate to work in unanticipated locations throughout the US. No Telecommuting. Send resume to E-Business International Inc, 4365 Route 1 South, Ste. 212, Princeton, NJ 08540.
